body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

`$ spack -k install 3dtk cgal=true compact_octree=true ipo=true openmp=true ^/rdzugft`

```
==> Installing util-linux-uuid-2.36-6ay5c3ish3zt6qevkpdhupt2ijarct7e
==> No binary for util-linux-uuid-2.36-6ay5c3ish3zt6qevkpdhupt2ijarct7e found: installing from source
==> Warning: Spack was unable to fetch url list due to a certificate verification problem. You can try running spack -k, which will not check SSL certificates. Use this at your own risk.

==> Cannot find version 2.36 in url_list
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed

/home/mlawso/bin/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1335, in do_fetch:
       1332                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1333
       1334        self.stage.create()
  >>   1335        err_msg = None if not self.manual_download else self.download_instr

       1338

       1333
       1334        self.stage.create()
  >>   1335        err_msg = None if not self.manual_download else self.download_instr
       1336        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)

       1332                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1333
       1334        self.stage.create()
  >>   1335        err_msg = None if not self.manual_download else self.download_instr
       1336        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1337        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1338

```

### Information on your system
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-577-b73cb64ba4
* **Python:** 3.7.2
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-power9le
* **Concretizer:** original

packages.yaml:
```yaml
packages:
  tcl:
    version: [8.5]
    buildable: false
    externals:
    - spec: tcl@8.5
      prefix: /usr
  cuda:
    externals:
    - spec: cuda@10.1.243
      modules:
      - cuda/10.1.243
  openmpi:
    version: [4.1.0]
  cmake:
    version: [3.19.1]
  boost:
    version: [1.74.0]
  flann:
    version: [flann-1.9.1]
  all:
    compiler: [gcc@10.2.0]
```

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: 3dtk
